articles.author: Bryan Armen Graham
articles.title: Ding Liren succeeds Carlsen as world chess champion with gutsy playoff win - The Guardian
articles.description: Ding Liren completed an improbable journey on Sunday when he defeated Ian Nepomniachtchi to become the first Chinese man to win the world chess title
articles.content: Ding Liren completed a most improbable journey to the summit of world chess on Sunday when he defeated Russias Ian Nepomniachtchi in a heart-stopping tiebreak playoff to capture the sports most prest… [+4071 chars]

articles.title: Gaviria Sprints To Victory In Stage 6 Of The Tour de Romandie | Eurosport - Eurosport
articles.description: In the last few hundred metres of the race, Fernando Gaviria turns on the afterburners to claim his second win of the season in the final stage in Geneva.New...
